edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class OpenQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.PageItem
      • edu.ucla.wise.commons.Question
        • edu.ucla.wise.commons.OpenQuestion
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NumericOpenQuestion, TextOpenQuestion

    public class OpenQuestion
extends Question
    This class is a subclass of Question and represents an open ended question on the page

    • Method Detail

      • countFields

        public int countFields()
        Counts number of field for an open ended question - each has only one field.
        Overrides:
        countFields in class Question
        Returns:
        int Always returns one since the open ended question will have just one field.

      • knitRefs

        public void knitRefs(Survey mySurvey)
        Just renders html; unlike closed- and question blocks, no shared-element references to knit.
        Overrides:
        knitRefs in class PageItem
        Parameters:
        mySurvey - The survey to which this question is linked.
